message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer to buy it from me for $90?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to accept $85 for the product?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $87.50. What do you think?
